SELECT a.*, d.agt_name agtName, a.succTotal/a.sumCount successRate, a.succTotalPrice - a.succTotalOutMoney - a.succTotalInMoney profit, (a.succTotalOutMoney - a.succTotalInMoney)/a.succTotalInMoney profitRate FROM ( SELECT e.agt_phone agtPhone, e.charge_addr chargeAddr, e.profit productProfite, bci.channel_name channelName, count(1) sumCount, sum(case when e.state = 0 then (e.price - e.out_money) else 0 end) succTotalOutMoney, sum(case when e.state = 0 then e.channel_price else 0 end) succTotalInMoney, sum(case when e.state = 0 then e.price else 0 end) succTotalPrice, count(case when e.state = 0 then 1 else null end) succTotal FROM lfs_order_charge e,lfs_product p,lfs_channel_info bci WHERE e.product_code = p.product_num and e.state = 0 and bci.channel_num = e.up_chanel
and apply_time between #{startTime} and #{endTime}
GROUP BY e.agt_phone,p.product_type,e.profit ) a, lfs_agent d WHERE a.agtPhone = d.agt_phone
and d.agt_name like CONCAT('%', #{agtName},'%')
